title: whowho - Caller ID & Block
summary: Use WhoWho as default caller. Provides many convenient functions(ex.  widget)
description: 1. Get informed on numbers as the calls come inChoose to reject useless spam, and never miss the calls that matter.WhoWho tells you all you need to know about unknown numbers in real time- both the good and the spam.2. Convenient Number ManagementUse your smartphone more efficiently by recording important information,such as whether numbers are safe or spam.3. Make Community Reports as OneShare information on unknown numbers with other users,creating a service that’s helpful to all users.4. Use WhoWho as your default caller on your smartphone The app allows you to use frequently dialed numbers faster and with more convenience,and offers several other functions, including friendliness stats on each contact, memos, schedule management, call recording, and others.In addition, make use of a variety of convenient widgets, including call logs, frequent contacts, and keypad.5. Block useless numbers for good!You can identify bad numbers (spam, voice phishing, etc.) before accepting calls,and you can completely block useless calls using a variety of blocking options. ! However Starting From Android 4.4(Kitkat), WhoWho will not be able to block text message(SMS, MMS) in accordance with Google’s service policy.6. WhoWho on WearablesUse WhoWho on a smart watch by making a simple adjustment to settings.* WhoWho is a totally free service* Wireless internet(3G or WiFi) is required for WhoWho to work normally* Starting From Android 4.4(Kitkat), WhoWho will not be able to block text message(SMS, MMS).* If you have any questions, please let us know by e-mail : whowho@ktcs.co.kr
descriptionHTML:
1. Get informed on numbers as the calls come in
Choose to reject useless spam, and never miss the calls that matter.
WhoWho tells you all you need to know about unknown numbers in real time
- both the good and the spam.

2. Convenient Number Management
Use your smartphone more efficiently by recording important information,
such as whether numbers are safe or spam.

3. Make Community Reports as One
Share information on unknown numbers with other users,
creating a service that’s helpful to all users.

4. Use WhoWho as your default caller on your smartphone
The app allows you to use frequently dialed numbers faster and with more convenience,
and offers several other functions, including friendliness stats on each contact, memos, schedule management, call recording, and others.
In addition, make use of a variety of convenient widgets, including call logs, frequent contacts, and keypad.

5. Block useless numbers for good!
You can identify bad numbers (spam, voice phishing, etc.) before accepting calls,
and you can completely block useless calls using a variety of blocking options.
! However Starting From Android 4.4(Kitkat), WhoWho will not be able to block text message(SMS, MMS) in accordance with Google’s service policy.

6. WhoWho on Wearables
Use WhoWho on a smart watch by making a simple adjustment to settings.

* WhoWho is a totally free service
* Wireless internet(3G or WiFi) is required for WhoWho to work normally
* Starting From Android 4.4(Kitkat), WhoWho will not be able to block text message(SMS, MMS).
* If you have any questions, please let us know by e-mail : whowho@ktcs.co.kr
comments: Bad to use. When the message comes up, two messages are displayed. The original Android message and this app message. It is a bit strange so I deleted it
When the pop up worked only for the unknown, unwanted numbers, I would have given 5 stars.  Now the pop up doesn't disable at all and I will be uninstalling until the creators fix this.
아이콘이 너무 촌스럽고 영문 UI스트링 번역이 반쯤되다 말았네요
It works but the pop up function won't disable. I disabled in settings, blocked notifications from it in my android settings. Pop ups won't stop so I am deleting this app.
좋긴 한데 혹시 광고제거용 유료앱을 파실 생각은 없는지? 깔끔한 인터페이스를 원하는데 광고가 계속 떠서 거슬립니다.
recentChanges: 더 많은 혜택을 적립할 수 있는 후후 포인트(잠금화면)가 별도 앱으로 새롭게 출시 되었습니다.
